name: silvestar.codes
description: Home of Silvestar Bistrović—a fearless web engineer, CSS developer, JAMstack enthusiast, WordPress theme specialist, author of the UI Dev Newsletter, and founder of CSS Auditors.
author: maliMirkec <malimirkeccita@gmail.com> (https://www.silvestar.codes)

scripts.clean: npm run clean-css & npm run clean-js & npm run clean-public
scripts.js: cd assets/js; for f in *.js; do short=${f%.js}; npx uglifyjs $f > $short.min.js; done
scripts.dev: npm run clean & npm run eleventy-serve
scripts.prod: npm run clean & npm run css & npm run js && npm run eleventy-serve
scripts.build: npm run clean & npm run css & npm run js && npm run eleventy-build
